Your job will be to demonstrate how Similarweb Shopper Intelligence solves eCommerce professionals' most critical business questions. From the optimization of user acquisition to the epic transformation of your eCommerce strategy - Shopper Intelligence helps you monitor consumer demand, analyze shopper behavior and optimize their onsite search strategies to win in the eCommerce world. At least 1+ years of experience in product marketing
Experience in a fast paced B2B SaaS or DaaS company, Ad Tech, or relevant marketing/industry experience (i.e. CPG and Retail or prior experience with Amazon ecommerce a must)

Analytical thinker, excellent problem solving, planning and execution skills
Motivated & hard working
Ability to be flexible and adapt to change

We believe that building a great product and a great company starts with finding amazing people and helping them grow and develop professionally and personally.
